title: Manoeuvring Attack
content:
Manoeuvring Attack Effect Spend a superiority die to make an attack that deals an additional 1d8 damage. On hit, select which friendly creature will gain half its movement speed. It will not provoke attacks of opportunity. Requirements Lvl 3 Battle Master (Fighter Subclass)Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.
